description: Create a job production plan safety risks suggestion.
permissions: Access is delegated to the related job production plan. A user may create a suggestion if they can access the associated job production plan per JobProductionPlanPolicy (e.g., admin; customer manager/operations with visibility; broker member; assigned planner/project manager; time card approver or subscriber; or assigned laborer/notifying crew).
side_effects: Creates a job production plan safety risks suggestion. If --is-async=true (default), the server enqueues a background job to generate risks; if --is-async=false, the request blocks while risks are generated and the suggestion is fulfilled.
validation_notes: --job-production-plan is required. --options must be a JSON object when provided. Only create-only attributes (options, is_async) and the job_production_plan relationship are accepted on create; prompt, response, is_fulfilled, and risks are read-only and set by the server.
